Package game.action_types

package game.action_types
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActivateAction
    An action to activate an object
    AOE_AttackAction
    An Action to attack the surrounding area
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    BuyWeaponAction
    An action to buy a weapon from the trader
    ConsumeAction
    The ConsumeAction class that will allow the player to consume an item
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    ExchangeAction
    The ExchangeAction class that allows the exchange af weapons and items
    LifestealAction
    An attack that not only damages the target but heal the user
    PrayAction
    An action to pray to the Church of Irith to get a blessing or a curse
    QuickStepAction
    An action to perform the GreatKnife skill which is to move away after attacking the other actor
    RecoverRuneAction
    The RecoverRuneAction that allows the player to recover the dropped runes
    RestAction
    The RestAction class which allows the player to rest at the site
    SellItemAction
    The SellItemAction class which allows the selling of an item
    SellWeaponAction
    An action to sell a weapon to the trader
    SummonAction
    The SummonAction class which handles what happens when it is called
    TravelAction
    An action to fast travel
    UnsheatheAction
    An action to perform the skill of Uchigatana
